name: before the end 2.0
description:
Before The End v2.0...

Imagine living the simple life in little town, as a farmer, where you can pick crops, collect fruit, and fish! There's daily mail at the postal office and plenty to sell or buy at the market. Everyday after a long day's work, you come home to your cute pet and a journal to write into before the ned day. However, one day you get a letter from home, it's an emergency as your father has grown ill and you need to collect as much money as you can for a train ticket! Do your daily tasks and get yourself $100 for a train ticket!

What's New?

New features

  • The 5th day now has a train station area that the player can interact with before reaching the end
  • Added in a new character to the train station, the ticker master
  • Added in a new item, the ticket

Fixes

  • Fixed minor dialogue spelling errors
  • Added a cat to the 4th day house, as it was missing one
  • Fixed minor tiling errors

Improvements (of existing features)

  • Made front and back part of fence, in the farm area, unable to be walked through, for more immersion
